vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κᾰθαρ-ισμός, ὁ,
later form for καθαρμός, [LXX+NT+2nd c.AD+].
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
cleansing, purification, washing
ceremonial cleansing, purification, Lk. 2:22; 5:14; mode of purification, Jn. 2:6; 3:25; cleansing of lepers, Mk. 1:44; metaphorically expiation, Heb. 1:3; 2Pet. 1:9*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) (禮儀上的) 潔淨
2) 潔淨 (內在的污穢) (來 1:3; 彼後 1:9)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) (礼仪上的) 洁净
2) 洁净 (内在的污秽) (来 1:3; 彼后 1:9)
